title: Zero-Shot to Zero-Lies: Detecting Bengali Deepfake Audio through Transfer Learning
summary: The rapid growth of speech synthesis and voice conversion systems has made deepfake audio a major security concern. Bengali deepfake detection remains largely unexplored. In this work, we study automatic detection of Bengali audio deepfakes using the BanglaFake dataset. We evaluate zeroshot inference with several pretrained models.
